name: Urban Labyrinth
description:
Urban Labyrinth is a very simple Unity created single level maze/platformer game that a small team of four created for a class project.

This game is based on a broad struggle of a homeless person trying to survive and make it to the finish before time and their health run out.

Background art created by David Nutter

Character Sprite created by Mary Nguyen

Background music and sound effect downloaded from various contributors from itch.io (Apologies for not remembering the usernames for credit!)

Programming/level creation by Cody Armstrong

Project Lead: Arlo Ptolemy

We would like to ask that you please consider donating to any of the following homeless charities:

National Alliance to End Homelessness:

https://endhomelessness.org/

Abode Services:

https://www.abodeservices.org/

Depaul USA:

https://depaulusa.org/

The National Coalition for the Homeless:

https://nationalhomeless.org/
